PageTitle: display mpls ldp error packet tcp
FuncDef: The display mpls ldp error packet tcp command displays the count and content of TCP error messages received by LDP.
CLIs: display mpls ldp error packet tcp [ peer <peer-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a peer LSR ID. If this parameter is configured, information about messages sent by a specified peer is displayed.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls ldp error packet tcp
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view statistics about and contents of TCP error messages that the LDP module receives, run the display mpls ldp error packet tcp command. The information helps diagnose faults.
